geeViz.geeView.mapper#

class geeViz.geeView.mapper(port=8001)#

Primary geeViz map setup and manipulation object

Map object that is used to manage layers, activated user input methods, and launching the map viewer user interface

port#

Which port to user for web server. Sometimes a port will become “stuck,” so this will need set to some other number than what it was set at in previous runs of a given session.

Type:

int, optional

__init__(port=8001)#

Methods

__init__([port])

addAreaChartLayer(image[, params, name, ...])

Use this method to add a layer for area charting that you do not want as a map layer as well.

addLayer(image[, viz, name, visible])

Adds GEE object to the mapper object that will then be added to the map user interface with a view call.

addSelectLayer(featureCollection[, viz, name])

Adds GEE featureCollection to the mapper object that will then be added as an interactive selection layer in the map user interface with a view call.

addTimeLapse(image[, viz, name, visible])

Adds GEE ImageCollection object to the mapper object that will then be added as an interactive time lapse in the map user interface with a view call.

centerObject(feature[, zoom])

Center the map on an object on loading

clearMap()

Removes all map layers and commands - useful if running geeViz in a notebook and don't want layers/commands from a prior code block to still be included.

populateAreaChartLayerSelect()

Once you add all area chart layers to the map, you can turn them on using this method- Map.populateAreaChartLayerSelect.

setCanReorderLayers(canReorderLayers)

Set whether layers can be reordered by dragging layer user interface objects.

setMapTitle(title)

Set the title that appears in the left sidebar header and the page title

setQueryBoxColor(color)

Set the color of the query box to something other than yellow

setQueryCRS(crs)

The coordinate reference system string to query layers with

setQueryDateFormat([defaultQueryDateFormat])

Set the date format to be used for any dates when querying.

setQueryPrecision([chartPrecision, ...])

What level of precision to show for queried layers.

setQueryScale(scale)

What scale to query map layers with.

setQueryToInfoWindow()

Set the location of query outputs to an info window popup over the map

setQueryToSidePane()

Set the location of query outputs to the right sidebar above the legend

setQueryTransform(transform)

What transform to query map layers with.

setQueryWindowMode(mode)

setTitle(title)

Set the title that appears in the left sidebar header and the page title

setYLabelBreakLength(maxLength)

setYLabelFontSize(fontSize)

Set the size of the font on the y-axis labels.

setYLabelMaxLength(maxLength)

setYLabelMaxLines(maxLines)

Set the max number of lines each y-axis label can have.

setZoom(zoom)

Set the map zoom level

turnOffAllLayers()

Turn off all layers added to the mapper object

turnOnAllLayers()

Turn on all layers added to the mapper object

turnOnAutoAreaCharting()

Turn on automatic area charting upon map loading.

turnOnInspector()

Turn on the query inspector tool upon map loading.

turnOnSelectionAreaCharting()

Turn on area charting by a user selected area upon map loading.

turnOnUserDefinedAreaCharting()

Turn on area charting by a user defined area upon map loading.

view([open_browser, open_iframe, iframe_height])

Compiles all map objects and commands and starts the map server
